coded_answer.p: I am writing to you to complatecomplain about the show "Over the Rainbow" at your theatre "The Circle Theatre". I am deeply disapointeddisappointed with the service and the unrealiableunreliable noticeinformation, at your theartretheatre.

I've attenedattendedI attended your shownshow on one of the evening, during my stay in London. In your advertisement you've mention "Danny Brook" would be starring and as it turned out it was a different Danny Brook. I am very disapointeddisappointed by this. You also mention that your show would startsstart at 19.30 but to my knowleageknowledge it started at 20:15 and that ismeant fourty-fiveforty-five minutes of waiting. Lastly, your advertisement mentionmentionsmentionedstated clearly that this would be "Your perfect evening out!" but sadly it was a real waste of time for me. And I would like a refunrefund,. You have wasted my evening and money.
I hope to hear from you soon.
